Articles.Content:
Due to the considerable success of the "KSP Forum plays: Spore" thread, I've decided that we should also try an experiment in making our own career mode in KSP!

Without further ado, here is where we begin:

First, we must decide what our name should be!

Then, what flag should we have?
stripes for the flag

Hmmm. I'll put my vote in for that.

Let's go with Spheres and call it . . . ForumPlays just sounds too uninventive, so . . . I can't think of anything right now so whoever else comes up with something, I defer to them.
Alrighty, the vote for the name is still open, and whoever's next gets first choice between Stripes or Spheres for the flag.
Spheres! Stripes are boring.
Retro ksp logo! There ain't no flag like a classy flag.

BLORBS!

tenchar

Spheres flag wins! (Had two votes compared to anything else)

The vote is still open for the name of the space agency.
Spacing out.

Finished.

Alrighty then, what should be the first order of business for Spacing Out?

VAB,

Mk1 pod

parachute

solid booster,

launch

Here's your vessel, built as requested:

The launch went swimmingly, and I got an EVA report from the pad just before liftoff.

The parachute worked as intended, and you can see that we're landing just a bit downrange from the KSC. After spashdown, I managed to get some pretty good science, including a crew report whilst flying.

And here's our Science:

What's our next move?
Get some decouplers, land on the Mun, return, and get that nice science! Wait, not the Mun, Minmus!
Take some delicious samples of the Launch Pad.
Objectives confirmed, will complete the mission and update with pictures when I get back home.

Due to the considerable success of the "KSP Forum plays: Spore" thread

Why thank you.

Why thank you.

XD It's my pleasure. Also, be sure to throw a rock at another species for me.

XD It's my pleasure. Also, be sure to throw a rock at another species for me.

...You can't throw rocks in spore.

...You can't throw rocks in spore.

I think you can, but if not sticks are basically rocks and you can definitely throw sticks.

Alrighty, here's what went down!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So what is our next move now?
Good job! I wasn't sure if you could do it. Now, with the new parts- Mun. Science ALL THE THINGS!

I wasn't sure if you could do it.

Hah. Wasn't sure if I would be able to either! But hey, you told me to, and I had to do it. Gotta engineer your way around problems, amrite?

I'll get to work on the Mun here in a li'l bit!

Alrighty, here's the mission.

Thus far.

I'll explain in a moment.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So as you can see... My distractedness resulted in this pickle. What should we do now?

So as you can see... My distractedness resulted in this pickle. What should we do now?

Salvage the mission! Make a course correction to get your Mun Encounter back and if you have the fuel land, if you don't just do the EVA reports. (dV calculation will be required after re-encounter)
WE NEED TO SEND A KERBAL INTO ORBIT. NOW. Please and thank you of course.
